must.name: commit-gh-cli
must.rationale: Automates the PR process with version bump, commit, changelog, push, and PR creation.

must.name: bump-version-cli
must.rationale: Handles semantic versioning without sed headaches; supports patch, minor, major bumps.

must.name: sanity-check-cli
must.rationale: Runs all checks across Bash, Python, Node, and Terraform; outputs sanity_check.md.

must.name: folder-tree-cli
must.rationale: Generates clean folder trees in Markdown; perfect for docs and audits.

must.name: slim-container-cli
must.rationale: Optimizes and scans Docker images with DockerSlim, Trivy, Grype, Dockle, and Dive.

must.name: radar-scan-cli
must.rationale: Scans folders or Docker images for secrets using Vault Radar; local or GitHub workflow.

must.name: brew-brain-cli
must.rationale: Tracks and compares expected vs installed brews; renders Markdown reports.

should.name: repository-audit-cli
should.rationale: Audits repos for insights, tag checks, and uncommitted changes.

should.name: self-doc-gen-cli
should.rationale: Automatically generates clean Markdown documentation from Bash scripts.

could.name: radar-love-cli
could.rationale: Simulates secret leaks across multiple languages for Vault Radar demos.

could.name: export-docker-image-cli
could.rationale: Lists and exports Docker images to JSON/Markdown; helps with hygiene and reporting.

could.name: repository-export-cli
could.rationale: Exports all GitHub repos to Markdown, JSON, or CSV with stats and summaries.

could.name: repository-backup-cli
could.rationale: Backs up GitHub repos with smart modular commands: backup, recover, prune, summary.
